title: Sweet Submission IV
description: A sizzling assortment from Silver Moon, famous names and new talent mix on these pages. Francine Whittaker, Sean O'Kane, Krys Antarakis and Kim Knight are the established stars, but then there is Gwendolyn Morgan, Olivia Lucas and Ash, plus the prize winning Corrine Williams. A real treat for every reader on every page!
author: Silver Moon Authors
